attributes.name: Work / Life Balance
attributes.tooltipText: Benefits that help support achieving a more optimal balance between work obligations and your other needs / obligations.
attributes.displayName: Which of these work / life balance factors matters most to you?
attributes.instructions: For each of the categories below, rate the item from 0-10 to tell us how important that category is, compared to the others.

levels.name: Absence management and occupational health
